text: Stress Management & Neuro-Science. 1. Neurobiology of Modern Stress. HPA Axis and Cortisol Fog. 2. Performance Inversion Curve. Yerkes-Dodson Law. 3. Focus Enhancers: Beyond Stimulation. Nootropic support. Table 1: Cognitive Performance Matrix.

sections.heading: 1. Neurobiology of Stress
sections.content: Chronic stress leads to sustained cortisol elevation, impairing focus.

text: 4. Integrating the Portfolio. The Aetheris Daily Cycle. Morning Focus, Afternoon Nuvia, Evening Somnirel. 5. Sales Strategy: The Premium Mind.
